func: return msg;

name: Format payloads to insert
func:
var reportPayload = {}
reportPayload.referencenumber = msg.referencenumber
reportPayload.UUID = msg.documentDecoded.Report.UUID.toString()
reportPayload.Timestamp = msg.documentDecoded.Report.Timestamp.toString()
reportPayload.Name = msg.documentDecoded.Report.Name.toString()
reportPayload.Number = msg.documentDecoded.Report.Number.toString()

var initRequest = {}
initRequest.referencenumber = msg.referencenumber
initRequest.casetimestamp = msg.casetimestamp
initRequest.UUID = msg.payload.UUID.toString()
initRequest.Timestamp = msg.payload.Timestamp.toString()
initRequest.RSAEncryptKey = msg.payload.RSAEncryptKey.toString()
initRequest.AESEncryptDoc = msg.payload.AESEncryptDoc.toString()
initRequest.HashSHA256 = msg.payload.HashSHA256.toString()
initRequest.SignatureValue = msg.payload.SignatureValue.toString()
msg.payload = {}
msg.payload.reportPayload = reportPayload
msg.payload.initRequest = initRequest
msg.topic = msg.referencenumber
return msg;

name: insert-query
func:
msg.topic="INSERT INTO test (name,lastname,code,married,timestamp) VALUES ('" + msg.payload.name + "','" + msg.payload.lastname + "','" + msg.payload.code + "','" + msg.payload.married + "',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)";
return msg;

name: lastname-query

return msg;

name: delete-query

name: update-response

name: update-query
func:
msg.topic="UPDATE test SET name='" + msg.payload.name + "', lastname='" + msg.payload.lastname + "', code='" + msg.payload.code + "', married='" + msg.payload.married + "' WHERE id='" + msg.payload.id + "'";
return msg;

name: callback response
database collection information
info:
The collection is named LicensePlate. 
Each document format is :
```JavaScript
{
    "_id": ObjectID("585a4732ac11400192a60b85"),
    "nom": "riotte",
    "prenom": "franois",
    "immatriculation": "123456",
    "heure": "13",
    "minute": "30"
}
```
